description:
AJCR-02 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Twisted Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Black

Cloaked in the mystery of midnight, this ensemble is a celestial dance of black. The embroidered blossoms of this Peshwas, like moonlit gardens, bloom in a tapestry of light gold sequins and ivory threads. The dress, a constellation of light-catching sequins, is a starlit canvas. Draped with an embroidered dupatta as soft as a moonbeam, this look is a nocturnal reverie, fit for a queen of the night.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front bodice with bodice hem on chiffon
Embroidered back bodice with bodice hem on chiffon
18 embroidered kalis for peshwas on chiffon
4 meter embroidered border for hemline of peshwas on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 4 side borders
1.5 meter wide width twisted silk for trouser
